column1: Little Goat Diner////I have to take one star off just for the comfort of the restaurant. It is always so noisy that you can barely hear the people at your table. Also
column2: it is quite cold near the windows in winter
column3: and a lot of the booths are right there. I feel like it is designed to be noisy
column4: but I really dislike that part. Also
column5: valet is more expensive than the meal!
